PfChannel:
Power Functions Transmitter - programmable remote control.
Sends commands to LEGO Power Functions infrared receiver.
* LEGO Power Functions RC documentation: https://www.philohome.com/pf/LEGO_Power_Functions_RC.pdf
* (c) 2021, Adam Orczyk
pfTransmitter.advancedSettings|param|aft: the pause before sending next signal in package (ms), eg.: 0
pfTransmitter.advancedSettings|param|rep: the time after which combo command is repeated (ms), eg.: 500
pfTransmitter.advancedSettings|param|sig: the number of signals in package, eg.: 5
pfTransmitter.comboDirectMode:
Combo direct mode (ordinary remote control).
Controlling the state of both output A and B at the same time.
This mode has timeout for lost IR.
pfTransmitter.comboDirectMode|param|blue: the blue output Combo Direct Mode command, eg: PfComboDirect.Forward
pfTransmitter.comboDirectMode|param|chan: the PF receiver channel, eg: PfChannel.Channel1
pfTransmitter.comboDirectMode|param|red: the red output Combo Direct Mode command, eg: PfComboDirect.Forward
pfTransmitter.comboPWMMode:
Combo PWM mode. 
Controlling the state of both output A and B at the same time.
This mode has timeout for lost IR.
pfTransmitter.comboPWMMode|param|blue: the blue output Combo PWM Mode command, eg: PfComboPWM.Forward7
pfTransmitter.comboPWMMode|param|channel: the PF receiver channel, eg: PfChannel.Channel1
pfTransmitter.comboPWMMode|param|red: the red output Combo PWM Mode command, eg: PfComboPWM.Forward7
pfTransmitter.connectIrSenderLed: Connects to the IR-emitting diode at the specified pin. Warning! The light (solar or lamp) falling on the diode or ir receiver interferes with the signal transmission.
pfTransmitter.singleOutputMode:
Single output mode (speed remote control).
This mode is able to control: One output at a time with PWM or clear/set/toggle control pins.
This mode has no timeout for lost IR on all commands except "full forward" and "full backward".
pfTransmitter.singleOutputMode|param|cha: the PF receiver channel, eg: PfChannel.Channel1
pfTransmitter.singleOutputMode|param|com: the Single Output Mode command, eg: PfSingleOutput.Forward7
pfTransmitter.singleOutputMode|param|out: the PF receiver output, eg: PfOutput.Red
